name: Custom Image Sizes by 99 Robots
author: DraftPress

sections.description:
Custom Image Sizes by 99 Robots is a quick and simple way for you to add your own image sizes to your WordPress site.

You can view this plugin on GitHub at: https://github.com/99robots/99robots-custom-image-sizes

Also, please check out our other plugins ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
1. Upload 99robots-custom-image-sizes to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to plugins page to see instructions for shortcode and php template tags
